name: Vontier Corporation
description: Vontier Corporation is a global industrial technology company specializing in transportation and mobility solutions. Established through a spin-off from Fortive Corporation in 2020, Vontier focuses on providing innovative products and services across various sectors including automotive, petroleum, and industrial applications. The company operates through several leading brands, delivering a broad range of solutions that enhance the efficiency, safety, and sustainability of transportation and mobility. Vontier's portfolio includes advanced vehicle diagnostics, fuel management systems, and automated refueling technologies. With a commitment to innovation, Vontier invests heavily in research and development to create cutting-edge technologies that meet the evolving needs of its customers. The company's mission is to enable the movement of people and goods safely and efficiently, contributing to a more sustainable future. Vontier is also dedicated to corporate social responsibility, focusing on environmental stewardship and community engagement as integral parts of its business strategy. Through its global presence and extensive industry expertise, Vontier is well-positioned to address the challenges of modern mobility and transportation.
